All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Helper
A class that contains all the helper methods of the QMA.
Main
A JavaFX application that includes the full implementation of the Quine-McCluskey algorithm (QMA) for simplifying boolean expressions.
MainController
Controller class of the Main FXML which enables the application to function.
Minterm
Represents a minterm in the boolean function.
OnesComparator
A comparator class that compares minterms based on the count of ones.
Quine_McCluskey
A class implementing the Quine-McCluskey algorithm for simplifying boolean expressions.
